name: HayWire - IGJAM16 Submission
description:
Haywire was created at IGJAM16 a 48 hour game held in Cologne, Germany during Gamescom.

HayWire is a 2D endless runner. You are a scarecrow and you put on different masks to scare away different coloured birds while jumping and sliding under fences.

Sorry there is no download as the team is still working on a better version of the game. We hope to release a high quality version of HayWire. Follow us on twitter for updates! Thank you for your interest in HayWire! :D

Lead Programmer: Alan Stewart (@ajsgamedev)

Art & Game Design by Armando Garcia (@Armando_Gunther) & Jay Tholen (@jaytholen)

Sound Designers: Paul & Thomas from soundsforpixels.com (@soundsforpixels)
